rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Kaur's Gift, then gain life and add {G} equal to its power. You don't lose that mana as phases and steps end.
When Kaur's Gift dies, gain life and add {G} equal to its power. You don't lose that mana as steps and phases end.
flavor_text:
[i]“There. Now the rest is up to you.”
—Kaur[/i]
